info.description: API pour l'association de baby foot BAB-INSA avec JWT
info.title: BAB-INSA API

post.description: Login with email and password to get JWT tokens
Revoke all refresh tokens for the current user
Get a new access token using refresh token
Register a new user and get JWT tokens
Confirm password reset with token and new password
Send password reset link to user email

get.description: Get recent ELO changes for all players ordered by date (newest first)

parameters.description: Number of ELO changes to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Check if the server is running and database is connected
Get matches with optional filters for player, status, and date range
get.summary: Get matches with pagination and filters

parameters.description: Filter by player ID (matches where player is player1 or player2)
parameters.name: player_id

post.description: Create a new match between two players with automatic ELO calculation and stats update

get.description: Get the N most recent matches ordered by creation date (newest first)

parameters.description: Number of matches to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

delete.description: Delete a match by setting its status to deleted. Only admin can delete matches.

patch.description: Update the status and/or winner of a pending match. All fields are optional. Only player2 or admin can update.
Cancel a match by setting its status to cancelled. Only admin can cancel matches.
Reject a pending match. Only player2 or admin can reject.

get.description: Get all players with pagination and sorting options

parameters.description: Number of players per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: pageSize

get.description: Get top N players ordered by ELO rating (highest first), with option to include current user
get.summary: Get top players by ELO rating

parameters.description: Number of players to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Include current user in results even if not in top (default: false)
parameters.name: includeCurrentUser

get.description: Get top N players ordered by team ELO rating (highest first), with option to include current user
get.summary: Get top players by team ELO rating

parameters.description: Number of players to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Include current user in results even if not in top (default: false)
parameters.name: includeCurrentUser

get.description: Get player information by player ID
Get ELO rating history for a specific player with optional match type filter
Get matches for a specific player, ordered from newest to oldest, with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.description: Number of matches per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: pageSize

get.description: Get all teams for a specific player (no pagination)
Test endpoint that requires JWT authentication
Get general statistics including players, solo matches, teams, team matches, and recent activity counts
Get team matches with optional filters for team, player, status, and date range

post.description: Create a new match between two teams

get.description: Get the N most recent team matches ordered by creation date (newest first)

parameters.description: Number of matches to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

patch.description: Update the status and/or winner of a pending team match

get.description: Get all teams with pagination

post.description: Create a new team with two players

get.description: Get all teams that include a specific player
Get team information by team ID
Get all tournaments with optional status filter
Get tournament information with teams

put.description: Update tournament name or description (admin only)

post.description: Register a team for a tournament (must be a team member)

get.description: Get paginated list of matches in a tournament
Get calculated statistics for a tournament
Get paginated list of teams registered in a tournament

delete.description: Remove a team from a tournament (must be a team member)

get.description: Get paginated list of users with optional search
Get current user profile information

put.description: Update user email and username (only authenticated user can update their own profile)

patch.description: Update user email, roles and enabled status (admin only)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
